ssa-retirement-benefits-spouse.title: Retirement Benefits for Spouse
ssa-retirement-benefits-spouse.headline: Retirement Benefits for Spouse
ssa-retirement-benefits-spouse.summary: Social Security is part of the retirement plan for almost every American worker. It provides replacement income for qualified retirees and their families. Complete just one application to be considered for all benefits administered by the Social Security Administration.
ssa-retirement-benefits-spouse.criticalA: A single SSA benefit application will be used to apply to all SSA benefits, but eligibility and approval will be determined for individual benefits.
ssa-retirement-benefits-spouse.eligibili: You are at least 62 years old.
